startParam.name: Landslide Detection Data Preparation
startParam.description: Perform cropping preprocessing on landslide images and labels

param.name: seed
param.info: Controls random processes such as image augmentation to ensure reproducibility

param.name: input_dir
param.info: Root directory containing multiple subdirectories of landslide areas

param.name: output_dir
param.info: Output directory for cropped small images

param.name: output_dir_no_cut
param.info: Output directory for cropped small images

param.name: crop_size
param.info: Length and width of the cropped image (in pixels)

param.name: stride
param.info: Step size for moving the cropping window (in pixels)

param.name: min_landslide_ratio
param.info: Samples below this ratio are considered background samples (0-1)

param.name: max_background_ratio
param.info: Maximum proportion of background samples in the total samples (0-1)

param.name: augmentation_methods
param.info: Available image augmentation methods: flip_h, flip_v, rotate90, rotate180, rotate270, brightness, contrast, gaussian_noise

param.name: augmentation_prob
param.info: Probability of applying augmentation to each sample (0-1)

param.name: label_png_dir
param.info: Stores converted PNG format labels (0 and 255)

param.name: target_sentinel_bands
param.info: Sentinel-2 band names to be retained during cropping

param.name: histogram_dir
param.description: Storage path for generated grayscale histograms
param.info: Storage path for generated grayscale histograms
